definition: outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: The exceptionally fast growth of populations in the suburbs and exurbs.
sentences.chinese: 近郊和远郊人口的迅猛增长。

sentences.english: About two thousand families will be relocated in the outer suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 约有两千户人家将迁至远郊区。

sentences.english: The scenic spot is on northwestern outskirts of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景区位于北京的西北远郊。

sentences.english: Floating population gather of outer suburban district is a new trend of population distribution and change in metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 远郊区流动人口集聚是大城市人口分布变动的新动向。

sentences.english: The solution of this problem is to establish industrial satellite towns in the outer-suburb.
sentences.chinese: 解决的办法是在远郊区建设工业卫星城镇。

sentences.english: We have found ourselves a beautiful exurban retreat.
sentences.chinese: 我们已在城市远郊找到一处美丽的安静之地。

sentences.english: The outer suburbs and its outer edge are district in resource-intensive manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 远郊区及其外缘为资源密集型制造业类型区。

definition: building under construction/commercial property/real estate (for sale or rent)
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
